alternativeNames: Yang, Aleck; Yang, T.Y.; Yang, Aleck T.Y.
comments: Yang, T.Y. Aleck (after 1996).; Yang, Aleck T. Y. used 1991-1992; Yang, T.Y. used 1986-1989.
examples: Clematis gouriana subsp. lishanensis T.Y. A.Yang & T.C. Huang in J. Taiwan Mus., 44(1): 144 (1991)(as Aleck T.Y.Yang). Clematis parviloba subsp. bartletii (Yamam.) T.Y.A.Yang & T.C.Huang in Taiwania, 40(3): 235 (1995).(as T.Y.Aleck Yang)
source: Name and date details from the author 29 October 2007.
